name: abc
content:
ABC noun
(ALPHABET)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ S ] UK (US ABCs [ plural ]) the alphabet: He's learning his ABC at school.
[ S ] UK (US ABCs [ plural ]) basic information about a subject: What I need is a book that contains the ABC of carpentry.

ABC noun
(TV)
abbreviation for American Broadcasting Company: an organization that broadcasts on television in the US the ABC
abbreviation for the Australian Broadcasting Corporation: an organization that broadcasts on radio and television in Australia and is paid for by the government
